price: Na kila umma una muda wake. Utakapo fika muda wao basi hawatakawia hata saa moja, wala hawatatangulia.
arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
footnotes: Na kila umma una ukomo wake maalumu. Na hapana uwezo wowote wa kuupeleka mbele mwisho huo au kuuakhirisha muda wake hata ukiwa mdogo vipi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walikulli ummatin ajalun fa-idhā jāa ajaluhum lā yastakhirūna sāʿatan walā yastaqdimūna
